title: IP Address Validation Function
description:
IS_IP4 checks if the string str contains a valid IP v4 address, if not FALSE is

returned. A valid IP v4 address consists of 4 numbers from 0 - 255 and

they are separated each with one point. The address 0.0.0.0 is there clasï¿¾sifed as wrong.

IS_IP4(0.0.0.0) = FALSE

IS_IP4(255.255.255.255) = TRUE

IS_IP4(256.255.255.255) = FALSE

IS_IP4(0.1.2.) = FALSE

IS_IP4(0.1.2.3.) = FALSE

78 Version 1.21

Chapter 8. Converter
name: IS_IP4

input.name: STR
input.description: The string to be tested for a valid IPv4 address.

output.name: BOOL
output.description: Returns TRUE if STR contains a valid IPv4 address, otherwise returns FALSE.

return_value.description: A boolean value indicating the validity of the IPv4 address.
